title: Love Island's Francesca Allen exudes style in a green velvet wrap mini-dress as
text:
She's arguably the most stylish contestant to come out of Love Island.

And Francesca Allen displayed her chic sartorial sense as she supported her family friend Sam Faiers at the launch of her new Quiz clothing line at Hedsor House country estate in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday night.

The reality star, 23, commanded attention in a green velvet wrap mini-dress which showcased her hourglass curves to perfection.

Stunning: Francesca Allen dazzled as she supported her family friend Sam Faiers at the launch of her new Quiz clothing line at Hedsor House in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday night

The brunette beauty flaunted her tanned and toned legs in the long-sleeved number, which had a touch of sparkle running throughout.

Francesca styled her chocolate tresses into bouncy curls and complemented her striking features with bright red lipstick.

The Love Island star completed her stylish ensemble with a pair of black heels and added some more colour with red dangly earrings.

Gorgeous: The reality star, 23, commanded attention in a green velvet wrap mini-dress which showcased her hourglass curves to perfection

Later in the evening, Francesca slipped into a polka dot satin pyjama set and posed for a snap with her sister Claudia and the The Apprentice's Luisa Zissman.

Francesca became friends with Sam through her sister Claudia, who is in a relationship with Sam's long-term boyfriend Paul's brother, Tony.

Francesca rose to fame when she entered the Love Island villa towards the end of the show, choosing to couple up with dancer Curtis Pritchard until he ditched her for ring girl vixen Maura Higgins.

Matching: Francesca, right, slipped into a polka dot satin pyjama set and posed for a snap with her sister Claudia, left, and The Apprentice's Luisa Zissman, middle, during the event

She then was forced to coupled up with Liverpudlian fireman Michael Griffiths by default and formed a friendship couple, but the pair were quickly dumped from the villa by their co-stars.

Francesca was praised for her composure during her brief stay in the ITV2 dating show's villa, with many viewers suggesting she didn't get the chance to shine.

Since returning to the UK, the brunette is believed to have struck up a romance with analyst Rory Hunter.

The couple were pictured kissing in the street during a wild night out while on holiday in the French resort of St Tropez last month.
description: The Love Island star, 23,  supported her family friend Sam Faiers at the launch of her new Quiz clothing line at Hedsor House in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday night.
